content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=2.5, y=2.5)
Consists of steam engine(position not specified), boiler(position not specified) and offshore pump (position not specified)

### Lab at position(x=0.5, y=0.5)
Connected to power infrastructure with ElectricityGroup(id=1001, poles=[(x=2.5,y=2.5),(x=8.5,y=9.5),(x=4.5,y=5.5)], voltage=0)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.5, y=-50.5)
Consists of burner mining drill (position not specified)

### Chests at various positions
- Chest at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5) with inventory {'coal': 725}
- Chest at position(x=43.5, y=-81.5) with inventory {'coal': 9, 'iron-plate': 9}
- Chest at position(x=2.5, y=0.5) with inventory {}
- Chest at position(x=0.5, y=2.5) with inventory {'coal': 10}

### Inserter at position(x=0.5, y=3.5)
Connected to chest at position(x=0.5, y=2.5) and lab at position(x=0.5, y=0.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure the entity can accept the item being inserted
- Make sure the entity is nearby and accessible

### Errors when using Prototype
- Ensure the Prototype attribute exists and is correctly spelled
- Use the correct Prototype attribute for the item being used

### Errors when researching
- Ensure the lab is powered and has the necessary ingredients
- Make sure the research is valid and not timed out

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure the tile is not occupied by another entity
- Make sure the entity can be placed at the specified position

### Errors when refueling entities
- Ensure the entity can be refueled
- Make sure the fuel is available and accessible
